title: What Donald Trump doesn't get about Matt Drudge
description: The latest target for President Donald Trump's vitriol isn't Joe Biden or Nancy Pelosi or the media. It's the man who runs an eponymous website of links.

title: Daimler to pay $1.5 billion in emissions cheating settlement with the US

author: Amy Chillag, CNN
title: Black lives matter in children's books, too. That's why this couple started a nonprofit
description: An Illinois attorney couldn't find a book with a Black main character on the cover for her niece. So she and her husband went on a mission to provide free books with Black characters throughout a Chicago suburb starting the nonprofit "Young, Black & Lit."
